alert.note: Alert for Okfuskee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 4:56AM CDT until July 06 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Okmulgee County in northeastern Oklahoma... Eastern Okfuskee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 455 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clearview, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Okemah... Henryetta... Weleetka... Dewar... Schulter... Clearview... Okmulgee State Park... Pharoah... Bryant... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 219 and 240. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
